'''''In This Solemn Matter Let No One Interfere!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Maguu Kenki]] without triggering its "Oushi no Omote" parry.
